instructions.da: Drej skarpt til højre videre ad Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.de: Scharf rechts weiterfahren auf Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ege dekstren al Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Gire a la derecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la derecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Braquer à droite pour rester sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.he: פנה בחדות ימינה כדי להישאר על Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.id: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Fau una stretta curva a destra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.nl: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo w ostry zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva fechada a direita para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ro: Virați brusc stânga pe Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Резко поверните направо на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Sväng höger och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için sağa keskin dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть різко праворуч щоб залишитись на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.vi: Quẹo gắt bên phải để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.zh-Hans: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway（Ref1）
